thread.title: Lawsuit Settlement Funding Firm Reports Fatal Pileup on NY Thruway that Left Two People Dead

author: cbs8
title: Lawsuit Settlement Funding Firm Reports Fatal Pileup on NY Thruway that Left Two People Dead
text:
Legal-Bay LLC
Lawsuit Cash Advance Firm says a four-vehicle collision recently occurred on the NY State Thruway involving two box trucks, a tractor-trailer, and another vehicle, killing two victims.
WHITE PLAINS, N.Y. , Sept. 10, Legal-Bay LLC, The Lawsuit Settlement Funding Company, reports today that a fatal four-vehicle collision occurred in August on the New York State Thruway, leaving two people involved dead. The wreck in Rockland County involved two box trucks, a tractor-trailer, and another vehicle. Authorities stated that the crash occurred around 10 am in Suffern , by exit 14B of Interstate 87, forcing a shutdown of the southbound lanes and causing backups in traffic up to 10 miles long to the Tappan Zee Bridge. There were also delays on the northbound sound. According to NBC NY news, police said "a preliminary investigation reveals one of the vehicles was traveling northbound, then crossed over into southbound traffic, causing the collision." The fatal wreck involved four vehicles, and the two people who were killed were in the box truck.
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20140714/126845
Unfortunately, major pileups and car wrecks such as this accident occur. The wrecks can cause serious personal injury, and sometimes, they can be fatal, leading to wrongful death. Legal-Bay is committed to helping victims involved in motor vehicle accidents.
Patty Kirby , COO and Head of Client Relations, commented on the recent fatal car crash, "We are very active funding cases in Westchester County, New York as well as in New York City . It is unfortunate to see an accident with personal injuries and wrongful deaths occur, fortunately we are here to help the victims and their families if they have valid motor vehicle accident claims and need money before their cases settle."
Legal-Bay, a lawsuit funding firm, is dedicated to helping victims involved in motor vehicle accidents, including car wrecks, truck crashes, bus accidents, and public transportation accidents including MTA bus accidents, FELA train cases, taxi cab or limo crashes, Long Island Railroad or New York City subway accidents, Commercial Airline accidents, and accidents on boats or Staten Island Ferry or Jones Act cases. To find more information on Legal-Bay's accident lawsuit funding programs and a list of funded cases, visit: http://lawsuitssettlementfunding.com/accident-lawsuit-loans-and-funding-products.php
Legal-Bay's funding programs are non-recourse lawsuit cash advances, also known as case funding or lawsuit financial services. None of the programs should be considered to be a settlement loan, settlement loans, lawsuit loan, lawsuit loans, pre-settlement loans, or a pre-settlement loan.
If you, or a loved one, are in need of lawsuit money or pre-settlement funding or settlement funding due to a motor vehicle accident, including a car accident, bus crash, semi wreck, or public transportation accident, please feel free to contact Legal-Bay on the company's 24-hour toll-free hotline where live agents can assist you, at: 877.571.0405.
You may also fill out an online application to receive a free case evaluation on your case at: http://lawsuitssettlementfunding.com
Contact: Patty Kirby , COO/Head of Client Relations
Ph. 877.571.0405 Email: intake@legal-bay.com
